rows.label: qst300403_msg001
rows.name: タスク２

rows.label: qst300403_msg002
rows.name: タスク２受注後

rows.label: qst300403_msg003
rows.name: タスク８報告

rows.label: qst300403_msg0001
rows.name: I have been expecting you.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0002
rows.name:
I daresay there is no need for
introductions here, but as a matter
of formality...

rows.label: qst300403_msg0003
rows.name:
My name is Lagert, Queen Regnant
of the Kingdom of Invidia.
...Perhaps you are surprised to see me.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0004
rows.name:
As the ruler of a nation, it is not
prudent to make my movements widely
known, you understand. My apologies.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0005
rows.name:
Thank you.
I have heard much of your exploits
with the Hræsvelgr Mercenaries.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0006
rows.name:
I asked for you because of your
proven skills and your unique position
which allows you to move freely.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0007
rows.name:
In Invidia, there are six great noble
lines said to descend directly from
the nation's founders.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0008
rows.name:
My own family, the House of Selosia,
is counted among these six.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0009
rows.name:
Each of the six lines has a treasure
called a Jeweled Signet, a precious
ring passed down for generations.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0010
rows.name:
When the six Jeweled Signets are
brought together, they form a single
seal - the national symbol of Invidia.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0011
rows.name:
But recently we received word that
one of the six Jeweled Signets has
been stolen, its whereabouts unknown.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0012
rows.name:
What we do know is the name of
the man who stole it - a Gulan
mercenary known as Garlo.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0013
rows.name:
I would like you to recover the
Jeweled Signet from this man.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0014
rows.name:
You would be willing to do this?
I am most grateful.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0015
rows.name:
In the present political climate, it would
be unwise to make this incident public
by mounting an official investigation.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0016
rows.name:
Who knows what unrest might ensue
if the people knew a symbol of our
very sovereignty had gone missing?

rows.label: qst300403_msg0017
rows.name:
I wish you the best of luck
in this endeavor.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0101
rows.name:
Thank you all. Your work was as
impeccable as your reputation suggests.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0102
rows.name:
I conducted some investigations
of my own behind the scenes.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0103
rows.name:
It seems this was all a plot by an
elite figure within Superbia to take
advantage of the succession conflict.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0104
rows.name: Worry not.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0105
rows.name:
Your mercenary comrades were able
to apprehend the main culprit as
he escaped from the Empire.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0106
rows.name:
And with the Jeweled Signet
recovered, it seems this entire
incident has been neatly resolved.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0107
rows.name:
I will send your compensation
through the Hræsvelgr Mercenaries,
as is the custom.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0108
rows.name:
I truly am grateful for your efforts.
Without your help, who knows
what may have happened.

rows.label: qst300403_msg0109
rows.name:
I look forward to hearing of your
further exploits in the future!
